Articles.Content:
Well, I do exist, so that title's correct.

I first found out about KSP in 0.21.1. It was a classic story (probably):

Seemed cool, so I tried the demo, loved it, bought the full game, and now here we are.

Well, I've typed three whole sentences now, so that's good enough.

Looking forward to more amazing updates!

It would appear that you do exist

Welcome
Welcome to the forums, and congratulations on existing! Glad to hear you've been enjoying the game so far.

I don't believe you!

Remember, picture or it didn't happened!

NOTE: this is a joke, I'm NOT really asking you for a picture
Welcome to existence! I hope you have fun explodi- LAUNCHING. I totally said launching.

Well, I do exist, so that title's correct.

I first found out about KSP in 0.21.1. It was a classic story (probably):

Seemed cool, so I tried the demo, loved it, bought the full game, and now here we are.

Well, I've typed three whole sentences now, so that's good enough.

Looking forward to more amazing updates!

Y'know back in the days of 300bps manual dial modems a statement like that would have inspired me to argue the point and prove that you do not, in fact, exist.

That said, thanks for the nostalgia trip, The old "blither boards" were fun.

Welcome and fly safe
I exist too, what a coincidence! Welcome to the forums, fellow co-exister!

Me exist? Only history will tell, but, seems that not much left in the history to be told. Unless you are a legends. So, make yourself a legend. Ultimate good or ultimate evil that does not matter, "Existence" thats matter.

...and I explode, therefore I am not!

Hello, fellow forum member... or maybe members? You never know...

Welcome to this universe! Does it meet your needs? Happy Existence!

Edited April 10, 2014 by EvilotionCR2
0o0 you exist Me too, YAY
